name: gestao-milhas-completa
description: Sistema completo de gestão de milhas aéreas com funcionalidades avançadas

scripts.dev: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.dev:ai: npm run server & npm run client & npm run ai:dev
scripts.ai:install: cd server/ai && py -3.11 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rmdir /s /q node_modules server\node_modules client\node_modules client\build 2>nul || echo Cleaned
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd server && npm run format && cd ../client && npm run format

author: Especialista em Sistemas
